fields.description:
I am seeing setups failing during eucalyptus initialize step for both 4.0.1 and 4.1. I have had it happen when deploying via QA system and via motherbrain. 

When the problem occurred, first I checked cloud-output and see that postgres is failing. [~viglesias] mentioned to check cloud-exhaust for 'Received new cluster view'. Sure enough there were a bunch of hosts that are not a part of the setup that are shown. Each of them belonging to other setups and also stuck at initialize.

Checking cloud-exhaust.log on my failed setup CLC which is host g-05-01 (less /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-exhaust.log | grep 'Received new cluster view') Notice all the other hosts.
{code}
Wed Jul 23 20:49:43 2014  INFO [org.infinispan.remoting.transport.jgroups.JGroupsTransport:Incoming-8,d-29-30620] ISPN000094: Received new cluster view: [g-05-01-1131|280] [g-05-01-1131, c-41-27331, d-29-30620, b-05-37399, c-30-55002, e-37-31459]
{code}

cloud-output.log
{code}
Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Failed to run ''/usr/pgsql-9.1//bin/initdb' '--encoding=UTF8' '--locale=C' '-Ueucalyptus' '--auth=password' '--pwfile=/var/lib/eucalyptus/db/pass.txt' '-D//var/lib/eucalyptus/db/data' '-X/var/lib/eucalyptus/db/tx' '--encoding=UTF8'' because of: (see stdout and stderr for details)
        at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.java:57)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.java:45)
        at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Constructor.java:526)
        at org.codehaus.groovy.reflection.CachedConstructor.invoke(CachedConstructor.java:77)
        at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.callsite.ConstructorSite$ConstructorSiteNoUnwrapNoCoerce.callConstructor(ConstructorSite.java:102)
        at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.callsite.CallSiteArray.defaultCallConstructor(CallSiteArray.java:57)
        at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.callsite.AbstractCallSite.callConstructor(AbstractCallSite.java:182)
        at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.callsite.AbstractCallSite.callConstructor(AbstractCallSite.java:194)
        at PostgresqlBootstrapper.runProcessWithOutput(setup_db.groovy:180)
        at PostgresqlBootstrapper.this$4$runProcessWithOutput(setup_db.groovy)
        at PostgresqlBootstrapper$this$4$runProcessWithOutput.callCurrent(Unknown Source)
        at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.callsite.CallSiteArray.defaultCallCurrent(CallSiteArray.java:49)
        at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.callsite.AbstractCallSite.callCurrent(AbstractCallSite.java:133)
        at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.callsite.AbstractCallSite.callCurrent(AbstractCallSite.java:141)
        at PostgresqlBootstrapper.initdbPG(setup_db.groovy:318)
        ... 16 more
Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: (see stdout and stderr for details)
        at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.java:57)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.java:45)
        at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Constructor.java:526)
        at org.codehaus.groovy.reflection.CachedConstructor.invoke(CachedConstructor.java:77)
        at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.callsite.ConstructorSite$ConstructorSiteNoUnwrapNoCoerce.callConstructor(ConstructorSite.java:102)
        at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.callsite.CallSiteArray.defaultCallConstructor(CallSiteArray.java:57)
        at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.callsite.AbstractCallSite.callConstructor(AbstractCallSite.java:182)
        at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.callsite.AbstractCallSite.callConstructor(AbstractCallSite.java:190)
        at PostgresqlBootstrapper.runProcessWithOutput(setup_db.groovy:177)
        ... 22 more
2014-07-23 20:59:12  INFO | :1406174352719:Bootstrap:bootstrap:COMPONENT_REGISTERED:Component db=available service=not-local
                          | :1406174352719:Bootstrap::bootstrap:COMPONENT_REGISTERED:
2014-07-23 20:59:16  INFO | Executing Pre-Shutdown Hooks...
2014-07-23 20:59:16  INFO | Executing Shutdown Hooks...
2014-07-23 20:59:16  INFO | Executing Post-Shutdown Hooks...
2014-07-23 20:59:16  INFO | Executing Post-Shutdown Hook: com.eucalyptus.system.Threads$ThreadPool$1@4b0359e6
2014-07-23 20:59:16  WARN | SHUTDOWN:Eucalyptus.SYSTEM Stopping thread pool...
{code}

Workaround:
log into each host that is stuck and kill eucalyptus-cloud process (may take a couple of times running the following command)
{code}
killall eucalyptus-cloud
{code}
fields.summary: Cloud fail to initialize: Received new cluster view
